name: Rafting Frenzy
description:
It's rafting time! Rafting Frenzy is a 2D top-down rafting game and it's the second game of the new LGV Sports Frenzy collection. With two modes, racing and free rafting (survival), and a lot of obstacles and powerups to boost your run on either mode, you're going to need to count both on your luck and skill to reach for a big score!

> Main features:
- Racing mode with 3 different options: 16, 32 and 64 checkpoints;
- Free rafting (survival);
- Powerups that might increase or reduce your speed and grant temporarily invincibility.
- Retro-style graphics;
- Procedurally generated map;
- Random obstacles, such as crocodiles, rocks and water currents.
